WorkItem.ClosedComment: Ok, so I fixed the Base Agility for Tauren Warriors (+1), everything else is working like it should
WorkItem.Description:
Trying to see why some stats are off. Not sure if I am doing something wrong.   Armor, health, AP, ArP, Crit Chance are off. Others slightly off(strength, agility..)
 
Downloaded from character profiler and Armory. Get same results. Check all equip against each other. 
 
Love this program but concerned about calculations.
 
Attaching my screen for your comparison

Comments.Message:
1) It's called MS Paint... much smaller and easier than Word
2) Procs are averaged, like the Mirror of Truth (AP), Needle Encrusted Scorpion (ArP), Berserking (AP) and any abilities normal to Fury Warriors.
3) Talents affect things and have no idea what your talents are from that image
4) While all that wonderful gear is .. nice.. it works against what I would really need to see here, which is a naked Tauren so I can see the base stats and if *those* are off
5) http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=PostingGuidelines
6) How DOES one shit up?

Something tells me your under alot of stress...so maybe I'll get back to you in a few years when this program is working better and your answers to a simple question do not appear so irritated at every little freaking thing. Good luck with your program.

Grizz, I think you misunderstood something. You might want to reread the response you got, and look at it from a different point of view. From your 'simple question', we're unable to give you an answer, because you haven't give us the necessary info. The burden is on you to do so, not us.

I understand if you need more information. I just found Jothay response quite rude and unprofessional. 
I am attaching MS paint jpegs. If there is any other information that you require to investigate the issue please feel free to ask.

As per our Posting Guidelines (http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=PostingGuidelines&referringTitle=Documentation), Jothay was alluding to a number of reasons why we need the actual character profile (.xml, not .jpg or the like).  We still need that profile if we're to diagnose and potentially fix the issue.

My gut is to go with Jothay's early analysis of the situation in that Rawr averages and adds in procs, adds in buffs, and adds in talents, while the Armory and most character profilers only consider your talents (and not even all of them, especially in regards to talents with procs).  Again, we can't say for certain, because we need your character profile (.xml) to be able to help you.
